projectGridLines.stationName: Cormorant Engineering India Private Limited - Development
projectGridLines.title: Full Stack Developer
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Responsible for technical design and development of solutions according to the defined requirements

Making sure your work is readable and maintainable. Ability to refactor is a must.

Estimate technical effort, work breakdown structure, risks, and solutions at a solution level.

Develop new functionality on our existing software products.

Ability to maintain effective and consistent communication within the team, with peers and stakeholders across own and other teams.

Provide input to application development/engineering methodologies, standards and leading practices.

Anticipate problems before they occur, define the problem, identify possible causes, work with a team to find solutions, select and implement the most appropriate solution. Ability to clearly articulate both problems and proposed solutions.

Proactive approach to identifying issues and presenting solutions and options, and where appropriate, leading to resolution.

Participate in Requirement gathering sessions with clients, interact with the client's technical teams

Skill sets:

Full Stack Web Developer (.Net Core + Angular).

At least a year of relevant experience

C#, .Net Core, MVC, Web API, EF Core, Typescript, Angular, Angular Material

SQL Commands, Stored Procedures, DB performance tuning

Good to have skill: Powerbase, API/Flatfile integration, Middleware.

Working knowledge of Version Control Using GIT

Working KrPage dg 2 of Deve6 pment Metodologes like Agile

Traits expectation:

Must have passion for coding and ability to learn new technologies quickly
